data.lyric:
[ti:Blue On Black(feat. Kenny Wayne Shepherd, Brantley Gilbert & Brian May) ((Explicit))]
[ar:Five Finger Death Punch/Kenny Wayne Shepherd/Brantley Gilbert/Brian May]
[al:Blue On Black (feat. Kenny Wayne Shepherd, Brantley Gilbert & Brian May)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Blue On Black(feat. Kenny Wayne Shepherd, Brantley Gilbert & Brian May) (Explicit) - Five Finger Death Punch/Kenny Wayne Shepherd/Brantley Gilbert/Brian May
[00:05.77]Lyrics by：Kenny Wayne Shepherd/Mark Selby/Tia Sillers
[00:11.55]Composed by：Kenny Wayne Shepherd/Mark Selby/Tia Sillers
[00:17.33]Night falls and I'm alone
[00:29.58]Skin yeah chilled me to the bone
[00:41.85]You turned and you ran oh yeah
[00:53.60]Oh slipped right from my hands
[01:05.81]Yeah
[01:06.63]Blue on black tears on a river
[01:09.58]Push on a shove it don't mean much
[01:12.67]Joker on jack match on a fire
[01:15.75]Cold on ice a dead man's touch
[01:18.84]Whisper on a scream
[01:21.92]Never change a thing
[01:23.83]Doesn't bring you back
[01:29.84]It's like blue on black
[01:43.53]Blind oh but now I see
[01:55.78]Truth lies and in between
[02:08.10]Wrong can't be undone oh no
[02:19.74]Well it slipped from the tip of your tongue
[02:32.01]Yeah
[02:32.74]Blue on black tears on a river
[02:35.77]Push on a shove it don't mean much
[02:38.84]Joker on jack match on a fire
[02:41.93]Cold on ice a dead man's touch
[02:45.00]Whisper on a scream
[02:48.07]Never change a thing
[02:50.10]Doesn't bring you back
[02:56.27]It's blue on black
[03:25.19]Blue on black tears on a river
[03:28.03]Push on a shove it don't mean much
[03:36.03]Blue on black tears on a river
[03:38.82]Push on a shove it don't mean much
[03:41.89]Joker on jack match on a fire
[03:45.00]Cold on ice a dead man's touch
[03:48.08]Whisper on a scream
[03:51.16]Never change a thing
[03:53.08]Doesn't bring you back
[03:59.35]It's blue on black
[04:03.52]Yeah blue on black
[04:09.79]Yeah it's blue on black
[04:16.06]Yeah blue on black
data.trans:
[ti:Blue On Black(feat. Kenny Wayne Shepherd, Brantley Gilbert & Brian May) ((Explicit))]
[ar:Five Finger Death Punch/Kenny Wayne Shepherd/Brantley Gilbert/Brian May]
[al:Blue On Black (feat. Kenny Wayne Shepherd, Brantley Gilbert & Brian May)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.77]//
[00:11.55]//
[00:17.33]夜幕降临 我独自一人
[00:29.58]寒气穿透皮肤 侵入体内
[00:41.85]你转身跑远
[00:53.60]就这样从我手中溜走
[01:05.81]//
[01:06.63]心情抑郁 泪流成河
[01:09.58]努力克制 也无济于事
[01:12.67]像个小丑 如火的热情
[01:15.75]彻底浇灭 如尸体般冰凉
[01:18.84]在尖叫声中低语
[01:21.92]并不能改变什么
[01:23.83]也无法挽回你
[01:29.84]心情抑郁
[01:43.53]曾经为爱盲目 此刻已经清醒
[01:55.78]真理介于两者之间
[02:08.10]犯下的错误无法挽回
[02:19.74]那些话从你嘴里轻易地说了出来
[02:32.01]//
